description: Retrieves information about a phone number.

parameters.name: NumberValidateRequest
parameters.description: Specifies a phone number to validate and retrieve information about. IsoCountryCode (string) --- The two-character code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, for the country or region where the phone number was originally registered. PhoneNumber (string) --- The phone number to retrieve information about. The phone number that you provide should include a valid numeric country code. Otherwise, the operation might result in an error.

nested_items.name: NumberValidateResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about a phone number.

nested_items.name: Carrier
nested_items.description: The carrier or service provider that the phone number is currently registered with. In some countries and regions, this value may be the carrier or service provider that the phone number was originally registered with.

nested_items.name: City
nested_items.description: The name of the city where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: CleansedPhoneNumberE164
nested_items.description: The cleansed phone number, in E.164 format, for the location where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: CleansedPhoneNumberNational
nested_items.description: The cleansed phone number, in the format for the location where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: The name of the country or region where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: CountryCodeIso2
nested_items.description: The two-character code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, for the country or region where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: CountryCodeNumeric
nested_items.description: The numeric code for the country or region where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: County
nested_items.description: The name of the county where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: OriginalCountryCodeIso2
nested_items.description: The two-character code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, that was sent in the request body.

nested_items.name: OriginalPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number that was sent in the request body.

nested_items.name: PhoneType
nested_items.description: The description of the phone type. Valid values are: MOBILE, LANDLINE, VOIP, INVALID, PREPAID, and OTHER.

nested_items.name: PhoneTypeCode
nested_items.description: The phone type, represented by an integer. Valid values are: 0 (mobile), 1 (landline), 2 (VoIP), 3 (invalid), 4 (other), and 5 (prepaid).

nested_items.name: Timezone
nested_items.description: The time zone for the location where the phone number was originally registered.

nested_items.name: ZipCode
nested_items.description: The postal or ZIP code for the location where the phone number was originally registered.
